text: Who is the judge for this case?

responses: The judge for this case is {Judge}.

text: What is the nature of disposal?

text: Can you provide the past case history?

responses: The past case history is as follows: business on date {business_on_date}, hearing dates {hearing_dates}, judge {judge}, order dates {order_dates}, order numbers {order_numbers}, purposes of hearing {purposes_of_hearing}.
